headline.main: U.S. PASTOR'S ARREST STILL ROME MYSTERY; Americans to Mark Thanksgiving in His Church Today

lead_paragraph: ROME, Nov. 19 -- The American colony of Rome will have its Thanksgiving service tomorrow morning even though the Italian authorities have arrested the only American Protestant clergyman in Italy, the Rev. Hiram Gruber Woolf, who remained incomunicado in the Regina Coeli Prison today.
